title: You recently answered a question about the repaving of Military Cutoff near Eastwood Road. When the repaving of Military Cutoff from Viking Lane to Eastwood is completed, will the jogging/biking path be continued to the sidewalk at Eastwood Road? The Military Cutoff Trail currently dead ends at Drysdale and does not continue to Eastwood Road.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=16597
